channel.title: Design tech work
channel.description:
Going to be using this thread to get help and shit for my design tech stuff.
First off can anyone suggest anything for a background, it needs to be a light background sort of white... but it cant just be a blank background. I will be using this as the background of every sheet i use. I can't really explain right now... and don't stress over it i'm just bored in DT and thought i would make a post (as i will be adding alot more to this over the coming weeks).
Sort of like this: [img]http://www.wikf.com/downloads/Backgrounds/jpeg/plain_1280_1024.jpg[/img] But two shades of white instead of two shades of red. and without the logo.
The actual size of the sheets i will be doing this on is 23.5cm X 40cm So something that resizes to that would also be good.

all i see is a black outline?
[/quote]Fix your colors, plub.

WHAT COLOURS IS THESE. SPEAK ENGLSIH.
but seriously wut?
[/quote]You monitor is to bright. There was a really light color over the white.
It’s like… a light coffee color.[/quote]
My monitor is set to full brightness and contrast, but I can see it fine :eek:

item.title: Design tech work
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

exe626:

Click Windows->History then un-do the last step from the menu given.

wow this photoshop thing is cool… i clicked styles when i clicked rosewood std font

very cool =D i love this stuff.

btw am drunk so you may want to disregaurde alot of my posts. ty.

Oh also thanks exe626 for da help.

edit - Wtf i dont understand like i click styles X and then i click off and it goes pink… and then when i click a different tool it goes back to normal…
I like that pink colour :s how do i keep it there… im completely lost.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“SeriousPotato, post:6, topic:144465”]Ah well, it looks totally different for me. But here’s another template for you:

[img ]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/6122/davidude36templatev2bo5.png[ /img][/quote]
thats perfect, i think i will almost definatly use this =] couldnt have asked for better![br][size=1]Posted on: September 18, 2007, 12:36:09 PM[/size][hr]Just downloaded adobe photoshop cs3 (uhm… yes… sure i payed for it) and i opened the picture in it… was fine… then put a font in saying “needs” and changed it to make it pretty (how it is now) and then when i clicked something (i dont know what) it changed the whole theme of it… into pink… so like what have a i done…

btw i really love the way it looks now actually… even though i dont know what i did… any ideas?

wutido.jpg800×600

Read full topic
